title: The development of catalysts and auxiliaries for the synthesis of covalent organic frameworks
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,7531-7565
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00908D, Review Article
Wei Zhao, Qiang Zhu, Xiaofeng Wu, Dan Zhao
Catalysts and auxiliaries play a pivotal role in forming COF materials and adjusting their properties. This review presents the state-of-the-art progress of catalysts and auxiliaries applied to the synthesis of COFs.
